description: This table contains the logical link between data elements in the de-duplicated Received Documents (DXR) and the composite DXR record. An example of a data element can be an allergy or a reaction.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Received Document record ID.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LOG_LNK_DDUP_REFIDS
columns.description: This item stores the unique reference ID for a deduplicated data element.

columns.name: LOG_LNK_CMP_REFIDS
columns.description: This item stores the unique reference ID for data in the composite external document record.

columns.name: LOG_LNK_DATA_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores what type of data the reference IDs correspond to.


May contain organization-specific values: No

columns.name: LOG_LNK_COMP_CSN
columns.description: The source document Contact Serial Number (CSN) for the corresponding data on the  composite external document record.

columns.name: LOG_LNK_CODE_SRC_YN
columns.description:
Signifies whether the Contact Serial Number (CSN) stored in I DXR 7110 should be used for code-lookup for this reference ID.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: LOG_LNK_SRC_ORG_ID
columns.description: This item stores the organization this line of data originated from.

columns.name: LOG_LNK_SRC_ORG_ID_EXTERNAL_NAME
columns.description: Organization's external name used as the display name on forms and user interfaces.
